comment: Utility class to create AES keys and encrypt / decrypt files
commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Utility class to create AES keys and encrypt / decrypt files</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
commenthtml: Utility class to create AES keys and encrypt / decrypt files
inlinecomment: ' Utility class to create AES keys and encrypt / decrypt files

methods.label: BytesToText
methods.codesample:
&apos; Decrypts an encrypted byte array and converts the resulting clear byte array to a string
Dim cu as New CryptoUtilities()
Dim publicKeyBytes as Variant
Dim clearBytes as Variant
Dim encryptedBytes as Variant
Dim loremString as String
&apos; encryptedBytes loaded from somewhere
publicKeyBytes = cu.PKCIReadPublicKeyFile(CurDir &amp; &quot;user-id.pub&quot;)
clearBytes = cu.PKCIDecryptBuffer(publicKeyBytes, encryptedBytes)
loremString = BytesToText(clearBytes)
methods.signature: Function BytesToText(Bytes As Variant) As String
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Convert byte array to string</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
methods.codesamplehtml: &apos; Decrypts an encrypted byte array and converts the resulting clear byte array to a string<br />Dim cu as New CryptoUtilities()<br />Dim publicKeyBytes as Variant<br />Dim clearBytes as Variant<br />Dim encryptedBytes as Variant<br />Dim loremString as String<br />&apos; encryptedBytes loaded from somewhere<br />publicKeyBytes = cu.PKCIReadPublicKeyFile(CurDir &amp; &quot;user-id.pub&quot;)<br />clearBytes = cu.PKCIDecryptBuffer(publicKeyBytes, encryptedBytes)<br />loremString = BytesToText(clearBytes)

methods.label: CreateAES128Key
methods.codesample:
%REM
    The following code creates an initialization vector and AES 128-bit key, then encrypts a file with them.
%END REM
Dim cu as New CryptoUtilities()
Dim iv as Variant
Dim key as Variant
iv = cu.createAESIV()
key = cu.createAES128Key()
Call cu.fileEncryptAES(&quot;test.txt&quot;, &quot;test_out.txt&quot;, iv, key, True)
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Creates a 128-bit AES key. </pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>

methods.label: CreatePKCIKey
methods.comment: Creates a PKCI public and private key pair, used for encrypting files.
methods.codesample:
&apos; Creates a new private and public key pair, passing success / failure to result variable
Dim result as boolean
Dim cu as New CryptoUtilities()
result = cu.createPKCIKey(CurDir &amp; &quot;user-id&quot;, CurDir &amp; &quot;user-id.pub&quot;, &quot;SuperSecretPa$$word&quot;, 4096)

methods.label: FileDecryptAES
methods.comment:
Takes a file at a source location and creates an AES decrypted version at a target location, using a passed AES initialization vector and key, 
optionally overwriting any file at the target location. You will need to use the same initialization vector and key with which the file was encrypted.
methods.codesample:
%REM
    The following code decrypts a file with an initialization vector and key provided by the person who encrypted the file.
%END REM
Dim hu as New HashUtilities()
Dim cu as New CryptoUtilities()
Dim iv as Variant
Dim key as Variant
iv = hu.stringToBytes(passedIv)    &apos; Using the initialization vector received from whoever encrypted the file
key = hu.stringToBytes(passedKey)  &apos; Using the key received from whoever encrypted the file
Call cu.fileDecryptAES(&quot;test_enc.txt&quot;, &quot;test_dec.txt&quot;, iv, key, True)
methods.argumentsuffix: (InputFile As String, OutputFile As String, AESIV As Variant, AESKey As Variant, Overwrite As Boolean)
methods.signature: Function FileDecryptAES(InputFile As String, OutputFile As String, AESIV As Variant, AESKey As Variant, Overwrite As Boolean) As Boolean
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Takes a file at a source location and creates an AES decrypted version at a target location, using a passed AES initialization vector and key, <br />optionally overwriting any file at the target location. You will need to use the same initialization vector and key with which the file was encrypted.</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
methods.commenthtml: Takes a file at a source location and creates an AES decrypted version at a target location, using a passed AES initialization vector and key, <br />optionally overwriting any file at the target location. You will need to use the same initialization vector and key with which the file was encrypted.

methods.label: FileEncryptAES
methods.comment:
Takes a file at a source location and creates an AES encrypted version at a target location, using a passed AES initialization vector and key, 
optionally overwriting any file at the target location. Anyone trying to decrypt the file will need the same initialization vector and key with which the file was encrypted.
methods.codesample:
%REM
    The following code creates an initialization vector and AES 256-bit key, then encrypts a file with them.
%END REM
Dim cu as New CryptoUtilities()
Dim iv as Variant
Dim key as Variant
iv = cu.createAESIV()
key = cu.createAES256Key()
Call cu.fileEncryptAES(&quot;test.txt&quot;, &quot;test_out.txt&quot;, iv, key, True)
methods.argumentsuffix: (InputFile As String, OutputFile As String, AESIV As Variant, AESKey As Variant, Overwrite As Boolean)
methods.signature: Function FileEncryptAES(InputFile As String, OutputFile As String, AESIV As Variant, AESKey As Variant, Overwrite As Boolean) As Boolean
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Takes a file at a source location and creates an AES encrypted version at a target location, using a passed AES initialization vector and key, <br />optionally overwriting any file at the target location. Anyone trying to decrypt the file will need the same initialization vector and key with which the file was encrypted.</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
methods.commenthtml: Takes a file at a source location and creates an AES encrypted version at a target location, using a passed AES initialization vector and key, <br />optionally overwriting any file at the target location. Anyone trying to decrypt the file will need the same initialization vector and key with which the file was encrypted.

methods.label: PKCIDecryptBuffer
methods.comment: Decrypts a byte array using a key
methods.codesample:
&apos; Decrypts an encrypted byte array using the relevant key and returns the decrypted byte array converted back to a string
Dim cu as New CryptoUtilities()
Dim publicKeyBytes as Variant
Dim clearBytes as Variant
Dim encryptedBytes as Variant
Dim loremString as String
&apos; encryptedBytes loaded from somewhere
publicKeyBytes = cu.PKCIReadPublicKeyFile(CurDir &amp; &quot;user-id.pub&quot;)
clearBytes = cu.PKCIDecryptBuffer(publicKeyBytes, encryptedBytes)
loremString = BytesToText(clearBytes)
Return loremString

methods.label: PKCIEncryptBuffer
methods.comment: Encrypts a byte array with the byte array of a key that is either private or public
methods.codesample:
&apos; Encrypts lorem ipsum string with a private key, returning the byte array of encrypted data
Dim cu as New CryptoUtilities()
Dim publicKeyBytes as Variant
Dim clearBytes as Variant
Dim encryptedBytes as Variant
publicKeyBytes = cu.PKCIReadPublicKeyFile(CurDir &amp; &quot;user-id.pub&quot;)
clearBytes = cu.textToBytes(&quot;Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet&quot;)
encryptedBytes = cu.PKCIEncryptBuffer(publicKeyBytes, false, clearBytes)
Return encryptedBytes
methods.argumentsuffix: (Key As Variant, KeyIsPrivate As Boolean, InputData As Variant)
methods.signature: Function PKCIEncryptBuffer(Key As Variant, KeyIsPrivate As Boolean, InputData As Variant) As Byte Array

&apos; Encrypts a file with a private key file

Call cu.createPKCIKey(CurDir &amp; &quot;user-id&quot;, CurDir &amp; &quot;user-id.pub&quot;, &quot;SuperSecretPa$$word&quot;, 4096)
Call cu.PKCIEncryptFile(CurDir &amp; &quot;user-id&quot;, True, CurDir &amp; &quot;clearFile&quot;, CurDir &amp; &quot;superSecretFile&quot;, True, &quot;SuperSecretPa$$word&quot;)

methods.label: PKCIReadPrivateKeyFile
methods.comment: Convert an RSA private key file on disk to a VoltScript byte array.  Optional password is used to decrypt a password protected key file.
methods.codesample:
&apos; Decrypts a private key file using the password it was generated with, and passes the decrypted byte array into a variable
Dim cu as new CryptoUtilities()
Dim privateKey as Variant
privateKey = cu.PKCIReadPublicKeyFile(CurDir &amp; &quot;user-id&quot;, &quot;SuperSecretPa$$word&quot;)
methods.signature: Function PKCIReadPrivateKeyFile(KeyFilePath As String, Password As String) As Byte Array
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Convert an RSA private key file on disk to a VoltScript byte array.  Optional password is used to decrypt a password protected key file.</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
methods.commenthtml: Convert an RSA private key file on disk to a VoltScript byte array.  Optional password is used to decrypt a password protected key file.
methods.inlinecomment: ' Convert an RSA private key file on disk to a VoltScript byte array.  Optional password is used to decrypt a password protected key file.
methods.codesamplehtml: &apos; Decrypts a private key file using the password it was generated with, and passes the decrypted byte array into a variable<br />Dim cu as new CryptoUtilities()<br />Dim privateKey as Variant<br />privateKey = cu.PKCIReadPublicKeyFile(CurDir &amp; &quot;user-id&quot;, &quot;SuperSecretPa$$word&quot;)

methods.label: PKCIReadPublicKeyFile
methods.comment: Convert an RSA public key file on disk to a VoltScript byte array. Public key files are never encrypted, so this is a convenience method.
methods.codesample:
&apos; Reads a public key file and passes the corresponding byte array to publicKey variable
Dim cu as new CryptoUtilities()
Dim publicKey as Variant
publicKey = cu.PKCIReadPublicKeyFile(CurDir &amp; &quot;user-id.pub&quot;)
methods.signature: Function PKCIReadPublicKeyFile(KeyFilePath As String) As Byte Array
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Convert an RSA public key file on disk to a VoltScript byte array. Public key files are never encrypted, so this is a convenience method.</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
methods.commenthtml: Convert an RSA public key file on disk to a VoltScript byte array. Public key files are never encrypted, so this is a convenience method.
methods.inlinecomment: ' Convert an RSA public key file on disk to a VoltScript byte array. Public key files are never encrypted, so this is a convenience method.
methods.codesamplehtml: &apos; Reads a public key file and passes the corresponding byte array to publicKey variable<br />Dim cu as new CryptoUtilities()<br />Dim publicKey as Variant<br />publicKey = cu.PKCIReadPublicKeyFile(CurDir &amp; &quot;user-id.pub&quot;)

methods.label: TextToBytes
methods.comment: Convert text string to byte array
methods.codesample:
&apos; Converts a string to a byte array
Dim cu as New CryptoUtilities()
Dim clearBytes as Variant
clearBytes = cu.textToBytes(&quot;Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet&quot;)
methods.signature: Function TextToBytes(StringInput As String) As Byte Array
